translations: 单层，单分子层（monolayer 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The researchers began by making samples of one or two monolayers of PbSe quantum dots deposited on flat single-crystalline TiO2.
sentences.translation: 研究人员首先在单晶体 TiO2 平面上制作一层或两层的单分子硒化铅量子点。

sentences.sentence: Mixed monolayers of surfactants were investigated by AFM and LB technique.
sentences.translation: 利用LB技术和原子力显微镜(afm)研究表面活性剂混合不溶膜的结构。

sentences.sentence: Objective To set up a new method of forming macromolecule self-assembled monolayers.
sentences.translation: 目的建立一种形成高分子自组装膜的新方法。
